cellularAutomata.artificialLife.factory
Class PiFactory

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.artificialLife.factory.ALifeFactory
      cellularAutomata.artificialLife.factory.PiFactory

public class PiFactory
extends ALifeFactory

Creates classes appropriate for an explicit simulation that solves for the value of Pi. The PiFitnessFunction requires a BitChromosome (in each Phenotype of the Population). So creates BitChromosomes, a standard ExplicitEvolutionStrategy, etc.

Author:
David Bahr

Constructor Summary
PiFactory()
          Creates a factory that generates classes relevant to solving for Pi with an explicit evolution scheme.
 
Method Summary
 Chromosome getChromosome()
          Instantiates a new BitChromosome.
 DataSaver getDataSaver()
          Instantiates a new "data saving" class appropriate to the Pi simulation.
 EvolutionStrategy getEvolutionStrategy()
          Instantiates a standard explicit evolution strategy.
 FitnessFunction getFitnessFunction()
          Instantiates a fitness function that assigns a 1.0 when the chromosome represents Pi, and 0.0 when maximally far from Pi.
 GeneManipulator getGeneManipulator()
          Instantiates a new gene manipulator containing crossover and mutation (which will be executed in that order).
 GeneticOperator[] getGeneticOperators()
          Instantiates a crossover and a mutation operator which are used in that order by the GeneManipulator.
 int getMaximumGeneration()
          Gets the maximum generation before the simulation stops.
 Phenotype getPhenotype()
          Instantiates a new phenotype built from a BitChromosome.
 Population getPopulation()
          Instantiates a new population using phenotypes built from BitChromosomes.
 SelectionStrategy getSelectionStrategy()
          Instantiates a standard selection strategy, where phenotypes (and chromosomes) are chosen probabilistically based on their fitness.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
